org.forgerock.openam.cts.adapters

Class OAuthAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.cts.adapters.OAuthAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenAdapter<org.forgerock.json.JsonValue>

    public class OAuthAdapter
extends Object
implements TokenAdapter<org.forgerock.json.JsonValue>
    OAuth TokenAdapter provides conversion to and from OAuth JsonValue tokens. Note: The JsonValue in particular is unable to parse its own output. Therefore it is less suitable as a container for JSON than one would like. Instead the serialisation is based on the object that is contained within the JSON value. Note: The object contained within the JsonValue must be a map. This seems to be the implication of the way it was being used previously by the OAuth sections of the CTS.
    Author:
    robert.wapshott@forgerock.com

    • Method Detail

      • toToken

        public Token toToken(org.forgerock.json.JsonValue request)
        Convert a JsonValue to a Token. The conversion assumes that the JsonValue contains a map which has an attribute called 'value' which contains the OAuth Token values. The TokenIdFactory is responsible for resolving the primary Id of the Token. Note: OAuth tokens don't have an expiry or user concepts.
        Specified by:
        toToken in interface TokenAdapter<org.forgerock.json.JsonValue>
        Parameters:
        request - Non null.
        Returns:
        Non null Token.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the object wrapped inside the JsonValue was not an instance of a Map.

      • fromToken

        public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue fromToken(Token token)
        Convert from a Token using the serialised JSON blob to generate the JsonValue.
        Specified by:
        fromToken in interface TokenAdapter<org.forgerock.json.JsonValue>
        Parameters:
        token - Token to be converted back to its original format.
        Returns:
        Non null JsonValue.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the object wrapped inside the Token was not an instance of a Map.
